titles.title: Honoring the life and work of Commander M. Scott Carpenter, the second American to orbit the Earth.
Honoring the life and work of Commander M. Scott Carpenter, the second American to orbit the Earth.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary: Honors Commander M. Scott Carpenter, the second American to orbit the Earth, for his brave work, unrelenting passion for space exploration, and encouragement in sending future students into the fields of aeronautics, astronautics, and undersea exploration.
